Title: Establishes a distinctive plate honoring recipients of the Girl Scout Gold Award
Summary: Establishes a distinctive plate honoring recipients of the Girl Scout Gold Award for which the regular registration fee will apply plus an initial one time service charge of $25.
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a distinctive plate honoring recipients of the Girl Scout Gold Award
